content:
路 Planets of the <color=#ffd52e>Taffeh</color> Galaxy feature yellow grasslands and tiered sandstone cliffs that blaze a golden hue in the sunset's glow.

路 Departing from <color=#ffd52e>Taffeh</color> on a Starsea Voyage, you might see towering dragon blood trees like arboreal umbrellas, or plunge unexpectedly into the ancestral cornfields that have sustained this galaxy for generations.

路 Planets of the <color=#ffd52e>Hexia</color> Galaxy boast emerald plains and rolling, velvet hills, forming a fertile tapestry woven with glistening rivers and brimming with rustic charm.

路 Departing from <color=#ffd52e>Hexia</color> on a Starsea Voyage, you may come across bamboo Islets where leaves dance on solar winds, or ride rice-scented tides toward a paddyfield Islet.
